meanings.definition: The condition of being without a state or nationality.
meanings.sent1: Many refugees face statelessnesses, unable to claim citizenship anywhere.
meanings.sent2: Statelessnesses can lead to difficulties in accessing basic services and rights.
meanings.sent3: The statelessnesses of the character in the story added a layer of complexity to the plot.
meanings.sent4: In the vast ocean of bureaucracy, statelessnesses can feel like being adrift without an anchor.
meanings.sent5: The documentary shed light on the harsh realities of statelessnesses around the world.

meanings.definition: The lack of citizenship or legal recognition by any country.
meanings.sent1: The statelessnesses of the individual left them in a legal limbo.
meanings.sent2: Statelessnesses often result from gaps in nationality laws between countries.
meanings.sent3: The comedy skit humorously portrayed the absurdity of statelessnesses in a globalized world.
meanings.sent4: The artist used vibrant colors to symbolize the vibrant diversity within statelessnesses.
meanings.sent5: The novel vividly described the emotional toll of statelessnesses on families.
